'''Glaze Medaka''' is a type of [[Medaka]] that can be located in [[Inazuma]]. It can be both found as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]]. Glaze Medaka can be obtained through fishing using {{Item|Fruit Paste Bait|20}}. This fish will spawn at any in-game [[time]].
